apresentation: I have been working professionally with software programming since 2016. Most of my day I work mainly with Java backend, with the Spring framework. I have had contact with other frameworks, such as PrimeFaces, JPA and JSF. In my work I mostly use MongoDB for databases, but eventually I use Oracle. I seek to improve my knowledge in programming and software development, applying my skills to the company's projects and needs.
experience_dbc_one_jobs: For the backend, Java 8, Spring MVC and Hibernate were used. For the frontend, PrimeFaces with SCSS and Javascript were used to customize the interface;
Create test cases in JUnit for unit testing;
Participate in alignment demands and project meetings;
experience_dbc_two_jobs: Development and maintenance of Java systems (JPA [Hibernate], EJB, JSF, Spring Framework, and JSP) using Oracle as database, Weblogic as application servers and SVN as version control tool;
Create and execute test cases in JUnit for unit testing;
Participate in alignment demands and projects meetings;
Introducing the use of agile methodologies and ceremonies.
experience_dbc_three_jobs: Development and maintenance of Java microservices, using Spring (MVC and Webflux). All communication async was performed using Kafka. Most microservices were built using MongoDB or PDB;
Create and execute test cases in JUnit for unit testing with the support of SonarLint and automated testing with jMeter;
ParticiparTeam developer leader, participating directly in business decisions and leading other developers into projects;
Promote technical knowledge meetings for developers;
Use of JIRA for trouble tickets and Confluence for the knowledge base.
experience_pucrs_one_location: Pontifical Catholic University of Rio Grande do Sul (PUCRS)
experience_pucrs_one_title: Development and maintenance of internal projects:
experience_pucrs_one_jobs: Analysis, development and maintenance of Java systems (JPA [Hibernate], EJB, JSF, RichFaces, Spring Framework, Servlets and JSP) using Oracle as database, JBoss and Tomcat as application servers, and SVN as version control tool;
Analysis, development and maintenance of database routines with Oracle PL/SQL;
Create and execute test cases in JUnit for unit testing;
Develop automated reports and forms, using Jasper Reports.
